summary: A test module that validates the behavior of the method-wrapping utility, checking its ability to correctly wrap regular methods, builtâ€‘ins, callables, lambdas, and mock objects, while preserving docstrings, handling inheritance and special dunder methods, and raising appropriate errors for invalid inputs.
